Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran's 67 off 40 balls helped West Indies clinch a two-wicket victory over India
Three bowlers were instrumental in restricting India to an inadequate 152-7
West Indies fumbled early in their innings, but Pooran anchored their chase
Post-Match Reflections: Player of the Match Pooran, who scored 41 in the first T20I, expressed satisfaction with his performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The hosts continued to lose wickets at a steady rate, with Hardik claiming three wickets, but tail-enders Hosein and Joseph combined for 26 runs to take the West Indies over the finish line with seven balls to spare
Others: The third T20 will be held at the same venue on Tuesday
